Posts.Content: BLESSED4 wrote: Hi,  My mom is in the hospital. They Just took her off the pump since she had since Monday. She has massivie mets in the whole spine. She has a rediation simulation today starting on Tuesday. She was originally set for a PET on Tuesday but landed in the hospital on Monday. She will have a pet on this coming Tuesday to check everything else. Our hopes are it has stayed in the bones and kidney only so who knows maybe treatment? We need to first get through this. It was pretty bad but she is doing good. Thanks for prayers. Luann, PM my moms box so u can call me. I can keep you updated and then you can update everyone. Tiffanie DX 8/06 stageIV IBC BONES Dx 8/23/2006, IBC, Stage IV, 1/12 nodes Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Update for my mom blessed4 BLESSED4 LuAnnH

Posts.Content: Dec 3, 2007 03:36PM BLESSED4 wrote: I have severe back pain. I take 200 mcg of fentynl and percocet and an occasional dilaudid. That does the trick. My cousin is a director of Nursing and has always advised me not to take liquid morphine, she says it has a higher rate of stopping your breathing. Other than that i have no personal experience. Hope u get ur pain under control.

Posts.Content: Nov 21, 2007 05:59PM BLESSED4 wrote: I agree with the fundraiser that will get you money the fastest.  Did Diane apply for SSDI?  That will come pretty quick because of diagnosis.  Talk to your social worker at your cancer center she may have some ideas.  Call the American Cancer Society they may have a list of foundations that can help.  I am sorry for what you are going through.  We are having financial hardship as well so I totally understand.  We have no insurance so most of my research on help has been for treatment.  Goodluck and I will pray for your family and you.
Posts.Title: Something else we all have to deal with. Bimmer AliceJean

Posts.Content: Nov 21, 2007 06:36PM BLESSED4 wrote: Also if you have life insurance you can cash in on some of it.  Try Cancercare.org

Posts.Content: BLESSED4 wrote: Hi Ladies,  I have not been on in a while. I had an ugly bout with depression and I just got out of the hospital. So I had an MRI and there is cancer in my kidney. The part that goes from the kidney is majorly blocked. So they are gonna put a stint and just continue chemo. I still don't know what new one. I just had Gemzar. Does anyone know what could be next if Gems never worked? DX 8/06 stageIV IBC BONES Dx 8/23/2006, IBC, Stage IV, 1/12 nodes Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Was In the Hospital BLESSED4 LuAnnH

Posts.Content: Jan 16, 2008 10:27PM BLESSED4 wrote: Thanks so much for the support. I had Gemzar and Avastin again today. Onc said from the PET I had yesterday no Bone progression so we will continue 2 to 3 more cycles. She said bone sometimes takes time to see if the chemo is working. Hopefully I get the stint in the kidney asap. I guess you have to take the good with the bad. I had went to the hospital for pain and I found out about the kidney. Well it could be worse. I got on stronger Lexapro seems to be working. I think I got overwhelmed with the holidays. I think I would have felt better sooner had I came here to vent. I didn't want to mess up the PC with tears. My daughter turned sixteen today and I am having a sweet sixteen party on Sunday. I am blessed to see my daughter become a young lady. She is my best friend and gives me a lot of inspiration. Thank you all again for the support. Love Angela
Posts.Title: Was In the Hospital BLESSED4 LuAnnH

Posts.Content: Dec 28, 2007 02:00AM BLESSED4 wrote: I use fentynl patches and that helps me. I have extensive bone mets with a compression fracture. You might want to try that. I have no side effects other than constipation. Also since its a patch i don't worry about daily pills. If I do have breakthrough pain I use percocet. I hope you get you pain under control. I would be very careful so you don't get any fractures. Good Luck and God Bless. Angela

Posts.Content: Jun 8, 2008 04:54PM BLESSED4 wrote: All you are wonderful.  I applied to the FairyGodmother foundation and they denied my wish because she said airfare was too expensive due to gas prices. That took a month and I am afraid too wait to long because I then won't be able to go at all. I am hoping for Disneyland because the flight is less than two hours. I have another sister who has been helping out also and has raised 1000.00 already. I have a paypal account. I have been in tears for two days to know that women who have never met me can come together and make someone's dream come true. I love everyone of you. If any one would like my e-mail address just PM me I will be glad to give it. Or Luann has it also. This means so so so much to me. Me and my family have never been on a vacation and I never had a honeymoon. I was diagnosed 4 months after my wedding. I would love to see my children have a happy memory through all of this sadness. Thank you all and God Bless. Blessed4
